products-title-pizza: Our pizzas are made with love...
products-title-sushi: Our sushi is prepared with tenderness...
products-title-sushi-th: And sushi burgers and bowls are made for discovery.
products-title-shugars: And desserts finish the story sweetly!
contact-title-help: Have questions? We’re always happy to help!
contact-title-help-th: Contact us and we’ll gladly answer all your questions!
index-preview-p: Warm food, good coffee, and a calm atmosphere
index-about-us-p: We cook simple and tasty food, serve fresh coffee, and do our best to keep the place cozy at any time of the day.
index-about-us-p2: It’s a place where you can relax, talk, or simply enjoy a quiet meal.
index-where-find-p: We are located in a convenient place where you can easily stop by on your way or come специально to relax.
help-products: Want to place an order, ask about our working hours or café address, or suggest a partnership? Call us at 079903033
index-preview-tekwill: This website was developed as part of the “Tekwill Junior Ambassadors” contest, organized by the “Tekwill in Every School” project, and does not necessarily reflect the opinion of the project.*
about-us-history-text: Our café was born from a simple idea — to create a place where it’s pleasant to come not only for food, but also for the atmosphere.
about-us-history-text2: We wanted to make a space where you can sit calmly, meet with friends, or simply relax for a while.
about-us-philosophy-comfort-text: A calm atmosphere and comfort for every guest.
about-us-philosophy-simplicity-text: Nothing extra — only what truly matters.
about-us-space-text: We designed the interior so that it’s pleasant to spend time here at any time of the day.
about-us-space-text2: Soft lighting, calm music, and an atmosphere you’ll want to return to.
what-customers-say-p: Every opinion matters to us, and we are happy when guests share their impressions.
